version_description: Fix in the login for old iOS versions.
We’re always making changes and improvements to the i-Say app. Get the latest features and the best i-Say experience by updating the app to the latest version.

Get the latest features and the best i-Say experience by updating the app to the latest version.
We’re always making changes and improvements to the i-Say app. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your automatic updates turned on.

In this new version, you’ll be able to check your account balance and user profiles without exiting the app. You’ll also be able to reach out to us in an easier way and use the app from more than one device. We’ve also added many enhancements for tablet users, as well as other bug fixes and minor enhancements. For this new version, you’ll need to enter your credentials again for security purposes, as we added a new login to secure your account. Hope you enjoy the new i-Say app!

Please welcome China and Kuwait! We also started rolling out new types of surveys according to your location or to the ads you've seen on your mobile device for some users. If you don't see it in your device, be patient, you'll soon get them! As usual, we also fixed and added more functionality. Download the app and check it now!
You can redeem your prizes straight from the app and other minor bug fixes.
